name: Nice Words
description:
"Say something nice to help me!"
A sad octopus is reaching out for help. Type some nice words to help them get rid of their bad thoughts. Maybe you'll feel better afterwards, too. :)

-
NICE WORDS is a game by:

Ivette Schmidt (@thebrokenbird(y)) : Code, Art, Animation

Cassidy Swanson (@Kettako(n)) : Music

Indri Dwi Ayu (@ndrdwy) : Game Design

-
 NICE WORDS was made for the GamesAid Mental Health Jam.
It takes about 1-2 minutes to play. It is endlessly replayable.
